id.description: The unique identifier of the comment.

entity_type.description: The type of entity (e.g., customer, invoice) that the comment is related to.

added_by.description: The user who added the comment.

notes.description: The actual content of the comment or notes added.

created_at.description: The timestamp indicating when the comment was created.

type.description: The type or category of the comment (e.g., general, issue).

entity_id.description: The unique identifier of the entity the comment is associated with.

object.description: The object to which the comment is attached.

custom_fields.description: Additional custom fields associated with the comment.
